metadata.Title: CVE-2020-25724 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in RESTEasy, where an incorrect response to an HTTP request is provided. This flaw allows an attacker to gain access to privileged information. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to confidentiality and integrity. Versions before resteasy 2.0.0.Alpha3 are affected.

criterions.comment: resteasy package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
resteasy3.0 package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
